alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:34PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Pima County through 315 PM MST... At 233 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gu Vo, or 25 miles southeast of Ajo, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gu Vo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument and Kuakatch. This includes the following highways... Route 85 between mile markers 62 and 66. Route 86 near mile marker 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
